page.title: 11A DAY IN A SCHOOLGIRL'S LIFE
page.content: My name is{Claire Deakin}and I am 9 years old .I wake up at ten past seven then I read until ten past eight.I go down stairs and have breakfast then I have a shower.I clean my teeth,get dressed,kiss mum good bye and then dad takes me to school. I put my things on my peg.We all sing a hymn then our teacher reads a Bible story and we say a prayer.Next we do English for half an hour then Maths for half an hour.It is 10.30 when we go out to play.After playtime I do Handwriting,Topic, Comprehension or watch a T.V.programme until dinner.During the afternoon I do less formal work.I go home at 3.15. When I get home I go for a bike ride. Afterwards I watch children's prog- rammes on television Then I watch the News.At nine o'clock after having supper I go to bed and read for a little while.Then I go to sleep.
